pages.text:
CONTACT US
Hidden Lake Resort is located in a serene environment surrounded by nature. Our nudist campground provides a relaxing and peaceful atmosphere for all our guests. If you have any questions or would like to make a reservation, please contact us using the information below:
​
Address
:
Hidden Lake Resort
4414 Wildhorn Trail
Jay, FL  32565
Phone
: 850-910-1494
Office Open: 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM CST
Leave a message or text for prompt return call.
Email
:
hidden.lake@hiddenlakecamp.com
Send Message
Thank you for contacting us!
GETTING HERE
Hidden Lake Resort is located in Jay, FL.
We are about an hour North of downtown Pensacola, 1/2 hour from Milton/Pace.
Directions to Hidden Lake
Click on the map for detailed driving directions  to us.
​
We're situated on a beautiful lake surrounded by hiking trails and a wonderful community of like-minded individuals. Come and experience the beauty of nature at Hidden Lake Resort!
* From I-10 go North on FL-281, Turn right onto US 90 E - Caroline Street, Turn left onto FL-89 N/Dogwood Dr, Turn left onto FL-87 N, Turn left onto Country Mill Rd, Turn left onto Greenwood Rd, Turn left onto Cob
​
btown Rd, Turn right onto Wildhorn Trail.
* From I-65: Follow I-65 S to exit 93 for US 84 toward Evergreen-Monroeville, turn left, turn a slight right toward US-31, follow through Brewton, turn left onto AL-41 S/Florida S, Continue onto FL-87 S, Turn right onto Country Mill Rd, Turn left onto Greenwood Rd, Turn left onto Cobbtown Rd, turn right onto Wildhorn Trail.

ABOUT US
Hidden Lake Resort is a nudist campground nestled within 110 acres of nature. Our beautiful lake, the blue moon lagoon, walking trails, and wonderful community are perfect for people who love being one with nature. We have been providing a peaceful and relaxing environment for nudists for 14 years. Our goal is to create a safe and welcoming environment for everyone who visits us.
OUR FACILITIES
Our 110 acre resort offers a range of facilities for our guests to enjoy. We have a BBQ area on the deck at the clubhouse. There are also tables, chairs and umbrellas for your convenience. The ice house and fish cleaning station are next to the clubhouse along the lakeshore.  The community fire pit is across from the office, behind the clubhouse. Our large, clean, co-ed bathhouse/showerhouse contains 8 toilets, 8 showers, 8 sinks. We have pedal boats, canoes and kayaks on the lakeshore for your use. You may keep what you catch in our lake. We are a pet friendly resort, as long as they are on a leash and you pick up after them. Bicycles, e-bikes, golf carts, go carts, gators, 4-wheelers and any other toys you have are welcome on the trails. The beach at the swimming lagoon has lounge chairs, tables and umbrellas.  There is also a shooting range on property. No fully automatic weapons are allowed. We do encourage you to bring your food and drinks with you, as we do not have a bar or restaurant on site. Our property is BYOB, however, no glass please. You will also want to bring sunscreen and bug spray; and of course, do not forget your towels.
"Hidden Lake Resort is the perfect place to unwind and enjoy nature. The peaceful and relaxing environment is just what I needed to recharge my batteries. I can't wait to visit again!"
"I had a wonderful time at Hidden Lake Resort. The facilities were top-notch, and the staff was friendly and helpful. I would highly recommend this campground to anyone looking for a relaxing and enjoyable vacation."
"The hiking trails at Hidden Lake Resort are simply breathtaking. I spent hours exploring the beautiful scenery and taking in the fresh air. It was the perfect way to reconnect with nature."

Every Friday and Saturday night the campfire is a blazin'.
Every Saturday Night the Naked DJ is playing his tunes with Karaoke, so come get your songs on.  There is always lots of laughter and fun to be had!!
BYOB
​
​
*
"
Camper Crawls
are just like a Pub Crawl, but instead of going bar-to-bar, we go site-to-site.  For those  who would like to be a host, you can make up a cocktail, hors d'oeuvres and/or game to share with the crawlers.  Hosts will also be able to participate in the crawl before and after we arrive at your site. People have been very creative.  The more the merrier!!!!
​
September 1-30: Hidden Lake Membership Prorated $250.40 until March 31, 2026 for a single/couple.
​
​
​
​​
​
​
​
​
​
​
​
​
​
​
​
​
​
​
August 29th-September 1 (Labor Day weekend): Friday night: campfire and music or movie if possible.
Saturday:  Music at lagoon until 4 PM, DJ/Karaoke 6 PM- 11 PM, camfire and camper crawl after dark.
Sunday:  music at the lagoon  until 4 PM, Food service for lunch and dinner, wagon trail ride 5 PM. Campfire and movie night afterwards.
​
​
September 20: Pot luck. Tim will be grilling pork steaks/chops. Please bring a contribution. 6 PM
​
October 18th: Monthly Pot Luck. Pizza and Wings 6 PM. Please bring a contribution.
​
October 24th: Pasta dinner by food vendor 4-8 PM. October 25th: Registration for run 8:30-10:00 AM, 11th Annual 5K race starts at 10:30 AM, awards after all runners are back. Trail ride 5 PM, Music/karaoke until 11 PM. campfire. Camper Crawl after dark. Food service will be here for breakfast, lunch and dinner
​​
November 1st: Turn back the clocks
November 11th: Veteran's Day. THANK YOU! to all our Veteran residents, members and guests.
November 27th: Thanksgiving/Friendsgiving Pot Luck 2 PM. Turkey/ham will be provided by the resort. Bring a contribution to share.
​
December 20th: Secret Santa gift swap. bring a $20 wrapped gift and an appetizer, snack or dessert to share. 6 PM.
December 25th: Christmas Day pot luck. Ham will be provided by the resort. Bring a contribution to share. 2 PM
December 31st: New Year's Eve. music/karaoke until ?, champagne at midnight, campfire. Feel free to bring a side, app, snack or dessert to share.
​
​
​
Every Friday and Saturday night the campfire is a blazin'.
Every Saturday Night the Naked DJ is playing his tunes with Karaoke, so come get your songs on.  There is always lots of laughter and fun to be had!!
BYOB
